level.heading: INACTIVE STATUS; REACTIVATION OF CERTIFICATION (ยง 17-9308)

level.text: An HHA with an active certification may request to be placed on inactive status.
While on inactive status, the individual shall not be subject to the renewal fee and shall not practice as an HHA in the District of Columbia.

To reactivate within five (5) years of an inactive status the individual shall submit evidence of having completed twenty-four (24) hours of continuing education or in-service training within the last twenty-four (24) months.
